description: This file sets up an agent with a language model and tools, then runs a stock price query and prints intermediate responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents a response from the agent during streaming.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A tool for fetching stock data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a query with the agent, streaming intermediate steps.
